titleStmt.title: Proposals for Mr. Clark's supplement to his annotations, which both together make a compleat commentary on the Holy Scriptures: being a survey of the whole Bible Contaning an analytical account, or division of all the Holy Scriptures; according a pleasant prospect into the several rooms of this sacred edifice, and the variety of furniture contained in them.
titleStmt.author: Clarke, Samuel, 1675-1729.
